com.calu.faciliteez.phidget1125thing

Class BaseEdgeServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.calu.faciliteez.phidget1125thing.BaseEdgeServer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Main

    public abstract class BaseEdgeServer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simplifies starting an edge server. It manages the command line parameters an the construction of the edge client and monitoring of any Things registered with it.

      • getEdgeClient

        protected static com.thingworx.communications.client.ConnectedThingClient getEdgeClient()
                                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a client for the specified server using the provided API key. Attach the shutdown code to the termination signal so that the client will disconnect when the program is stopped with a CTRL-C.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • attachClientShutdownToSigTerm

        protected static void attachClientShutdownToSigTerm()
        Attach client disconnect handlers for when the program gets a signal to stop running.

      • monitorThings

        protected static void monitorThings()
                             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Pushes all values of all things being monitored up to the server. This function will not return. It will repeat pushing values every POLLING_INTERVAL_MILLISECONDS.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
